snippet.title: SNES Sutte Hakkun
snippet.description: Developed by Indieszero (of both DS "Game Center CX" fame) alongside Nintendo, "Sutte Hakkun" ("すってはっくん") is a excellent platform puzzle that began it's life in the Sattelaview Super Famicom add-on, spawning four different emissions from 1997 onwards and this version that came out on cartridge in 1999. It was the same game as the "Nintendo Power" emission, the second of the series. It's easier to just watch the video than to explain the game mechanics so please enjoy. Yes, I do hate level 1-8 very much, thank you. But it's nothing compared to the head scratching of levels ahead.
